html.p: It's a web page belonging to Brian Duff with some random stuff on it.

"From there Elisha went up to Bethel. As he was walking along the road, some youths came out of the town and jeered at him. "Go on up, you baldhead!" they said. "Go on up, you baldhead!" He turned around, looked at them and called down a curse on them in the name of the LORD. Then two bears came out of the woods and mauled forty-two of the youths." [2 Kings 2:23-24]
For some reason, I found this excessively funny.

"Although Tomcat 3.3 is still in production, it's already more stable, scalable and configurable than previous versions. This article describes how to set up the XSQL Servlet, supplied with Oracle XDK 9.0.2.0.0A beta on Tomcat 3.3 milestone 4." more...
